item.title: 电子商务公司 Allegro 计划 2025 年在波兰增加 2,500 个包裹柜
item.description: 电子商务公司 Allegro 的财务总监告诉路透社，该公司计划今年在波兰本土市场将其包裹储物柜网络扩大 2500 个，因为该公司正致力于提高通过其管理的服务交付包裹的份额。【原文：E-commerce firm Allegro plans to expand its parcel locker network by 2,500 units in its home market Poland this year, as it focuses on increasing the share of parcels delivered through the service it manages, its finance chief told Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普驱动的市场大滑坡、大颠簸和大跳跃图表
item.description: 以下是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普最近几周的行动所引发的一些重大金融市场动向，从他重燃全球贸易战到发出欧洲不能再把美国军事力量的支持视为理所当然的信号。【原文：Below are some of the sizable financial market moves prompted by the actions of U.S. President Donald Trump in recent weeks from his re-ignition of a global trade war to the signal that Europe can no longer take the support of U.S. military muscle for granted.】

item.title: 路威酩轩集团（LVMH）为伯纳德-阿尔诺（Bernard Arnault）执掌集团至85岁扫清障碍
item.description: 如果股东们在 4 月 17 日举行的年度股东大会上支持公司的一项提案，现年 76 岁的伯纳德-阿诺特（Bernard Arnault）将继续执掌全球最大的奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH），直到 85 岁。【原文：Bernard Arnault, 76, could remain at the helm of the world's largest luxury group LVMH until he's 85 if shareholders back a company proposal at its annual shareholder meeting on April 17.】

item.title: 特斯拉与百度合作改进中国辅助驾驶系统 - 消息人士称
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，特斯拉正在与中国科技巨头百度合作，以改善其高级驾驶辅助系统（ADAS）在中国的性能。【原文：Tesla is working with Chinese tech giant Baidu to improve the performance of its advanced driving assistance (ADAS) system in China, two people with knowledge of the matter said, after a recent update drew customer criticism.】

item.title: 力拓皮尔巴拉矿区工人签署集体谈判请愿书
item.description: 澳大利亚西部矿工联盟（WMWA）周四表示，力拓位于皮尔巴拉地区的帕拉布尔杜铁矿的 400 多名工人已签署请愿书，支持集体谈判。【原文：Australia's Western Mine Workers Alliance (WMWA) said on Thursday that more than 400 workers at Rio Tinto's Paraburdoo iron ore mine in Pilbara region have signed a petition to support collective bargaining.】

item.title: 欧洲卡车股价因美国电动汽车规则逆转而下跌
item.description: 在美国环境保护局（EPA）表示将开始努力推翻拜登政府的汽车尾气排放规定后，欧洲卡车制造商的股票周四下跌。【原文：Shares in European truck makers fell on Thursday after the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) said it would start efforts to reverse the Biden administration's vehicle emissions rules.】

item.title: 聚焦：美国服装生产为何不可能发生重大转变
item.description: 几位高管本周告诉路透社，唐纳德-特朗普总统推动的 "美国制造 "正在促使一些美国服装零售商扩大从T恤衫到大衣和西装等各种产品的国内生产。【原文：President Donald Trump's Made in America push is prompting some U.S. clothing retailers to expand domestic production of everything from T-shirts to coats and suits, several executives told Reuters this week.】

item.title: 大众汽车削减成本，销量品牌经营业绩下降 4.3
item.description: 大众汽车的核心品牌（包括大众乘用车、斯柯达、SEAT/CUPRA 和商用车）周四公布的经营业绩下降了 4.3%，因为该汽车制造商正在进行重组以削减成本。【原文：Volkswagen's core brands, including VW Passenger Cars, Skoda, SEAT/CUPRA and Commercial Vehicles, reported a 4.3% drop in their operating results on Thursday as the carmaker undergoes a restructuring to cut costs.】

item.title: 德国莱茵金属公司价值超过大众汽车公司，防务市场继续上涨
item.description: 欧洲最大的弹药制造商莱茵金属公司（Rheinmetall）的市场估值已经超过了欧洲最大的汽车制造商大众汽车公司（Volkswagen），这是投资者对国防类股票兴趣上升的最新迹象。【原文：Rheinmetall , Europe's biggest ammunition maker, has overtaken the continent's top carmaker Volkswagen in terms of market valuation, in the latest sign of rising investor appetite for defence stocks.】

item.title: 研究所上调 2026 年德国经济增长预期，预计将出现消费热潮
item.description: 德国 IfW 经济研究所周四上调了对欧洲最大经济体 2026 年经济增长的预期，预计保守派大选获胜者弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）正在推动的公共支出增长将带来利好。【原文：Germany's IfW economic institute raised its 2026 growth estimate for Europe's largest economy on Thursday, anticipating tailwinds from a public spending boost that conservative election winner Friedrich Merz is pushing for.】

item.title: 被美国列入黑名单的智浦人工智能获得中国国企新一轮融资
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司智璞 AI 从国有企业华发集团获得了 5 亿元人民币（6904 万美元）的融资，而在此之前仅一周，该公司还宣布了另外一项 10 亿元人民币的融资计划。【原文：Chinese AI startup Zhipu AI secured 500 million yuan ($69.04 million) in funding from state-owned Huafa Group, just one week after announcing a separate 1 billion yuan capital raise.】

item.title: 印度监管机构计划将卫星许可期限限制为五年，藐视马斯克的 "星链 "计划
item.description: 一位高级政府消息人士称，印度电信监管机构计划建议将卫星宽带频谱分配五年左右，以评估市场的初步采用情况，这是对伊隆-马斯克的 Starlink 公司的挑战，该公司正在寻求获得 20 年的许可。【原文：India's telecom regulator plans to recommend that satellite broadband spectrum be allotted for around five years to assess initial market adoption, defying Elon Musk's Starlink, which is seeking a 20-year permit, said a senior government source.】

item.title: 英国第一太平戴维斯在实现年度利润增长后，认为重返办公楼将推动 2025 年的销量增长
item.description: 全球房地产顾问公司第一太平戴维斯（Savills）在公布好于预期的年度利润后，预计继续推进 "回归办公 "将有助于 2025 年的交易量。【原文：Global real estate advisor Savills expects a continued back-to-office push to help transaction volumes in 2025, after it posted better than expected annual profit.】

item.title: 德意志银行四大业务均实现 2025 年收入增长
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）周四预计，2025 年其投资银行和其他三个主要业务部门的收入将有所增长。【原文：Deutsche Bank on Thursday forecast increased revenue in 2025 at its investment bank and three other main business units.】

item.title: 欧洲放弃俄罗斯天然气，俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司的辉煌逐渐褪色
item.description: 11 年前，俄罗斯天然气巨头俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）首席执行官阿列克谢-米勒（Alexei Miller）在圣彼得堡市中心启用了一座意大利宫殿式豪华建筑，作为公司出口部门的办公场所。【原文：When the CEO of Russian state gas giant Gazprom, Alexei Miller, opened a lavish Italian palazzo-styled building in central St Petersburg to house the company's export arm 11 years ago, he augured a future funded by European sales.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行英国石油公司全年净利润大涨 132
item.description: 法国巴黎银行波兰分行 BNP Paribas BP 周四公布，受银行业流动性过剩和利率持续走高的支撑，其全年净利润增幅高于预期。【原文：BNP Paribas BP , the Polish unit of lender BNP Paribas , posted a higher-than-expected jump in its full-year net profit on Thursday, supported by excess banking sector liquidity and persistently high interest rates.】

item.title: 文件显示，越南监管机构建议批准中国商飞公司的喷气式飞机
item.description: 据路透社看到的文件显示，越南航空监管机构已提议承认中国的飞机设计认证等同于美国标准，从而为中国国有飞机制造商中国商飞公司的喷气式飞机进入越南市场提供便利。【原文：Vietnam's aviation regulator has proposed to recognise China's aircraft design certifications as equivalent to U.S. standards, facilitating the entry of jets from Chinese state-owned planemaker COMAC, according to documents seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 雨果博斯预计 2025 年销售额将与上年持平
item.description: Hugo Boss 周四表示，在 2024 年销售额略超市场预期后，预计全年销售额将与去年基本持平。【原文：Hugo Boss said on Thursday it expected annual sales to remain broadly in line with last year, after its 2024 sales slightly surpassed market expectations.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，百威啤酒亚太区将裁员数千人，以降低成本 15
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，百威啤酒亚太有限公司计划今年裁员数千人，以缩减成本。【原文：Budweiser Brewing Co APAC Ltd is planning to cut thousands of jobs this year as it looks to shrink costs, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter, as the beer maker struggles with weak consumer demand in China.】

item.title: 南非标准银行年度利润增长 4
item.description: 非洲资产规模最大的银行--标准银行（Standard Bank）周四公布年度利润增长 4%，并宣布派发每股 763 美分的末期股息。【原文：Africa's biggest lender by assets, Standard Bank , on Thursday reported annual profit rose by 4% and declared a final dividend of 763 cents a share.】

item.title: 通用集团创下年度利润新高，顶级投资者准备参加股东大会角逐
item.description: Generali 周四公布了 2024 年的创纪录利润，符合预期，首席执行官菲利普-多内特（Philippe Donnet）准备在下个月就其连任问题面临关键的股东投票。【原文：Generali on Thursday posted a record profit for 2024, in line with expectations, as Chief Executive Philippe Donnet prepares to face a key shareholder vote next month over his reappointment.】

item.title: 透视：波音 787 喷气式客机的故障部件如何在意大利的雷达监视下飞行
item.description: 2020 年 5 月的一个星期六上午，意大利警察在南部港口城市布林迪西一家小型飞机零部件工厂附近抓获了两名向下水道倾倒化学废料的男子。【原文：On a Saturday morning in May, 2020, Italian police officers caught two men pouring chemical waste into the sewers in the southern port city of Brindisi, near a small plane components factory.】

item.title: 日本央行本月将维持利率不变，第三季度（最有可能在 7 月）将利率上调至 0.75%：路透调查
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，超过三分之二的经济学家预计日本央行将在 3 月 19 日的会议上维持关键利率稳定，并在第三季度将利率上调 25 个基点至 0.75%，最有可能在 7 月份上调。【原文：The Bank of Japan is expected to keep its key interest rate steady at its March 19 meeting, with over two-thirds of economists expecting a 25-basis-point hike to 0.75% in the third quarter, most likely in July, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 新加坡检方称美国服务器欺诈案涉及 3.9 亿美元交易
item.description: 新加坡检方称，根据周四的庭审记录，一起涉及新加坡公司提供的服务器被转移到海外的欺诈案涉及价值 3.9 亿美元的交易。【原文：Singapore prosecutors said a fraud case involving servers supplied by Singapore-based firms that were moved offshore involves transactions worth $390 million, according to court proceedings on Thursday.】

item.title: 新加坡检方称美国服务器欺诈案涉及 3.9 亿美元交易
item.description: 新加坡检方称，根据周四的庭审记录，一起涉及新加坡公司提供的服务器被转移到海外的欺诈案涉及价值 3.9 亿美元的交易。【原文：Singapore prosecutors said a fraud case involving servers supplied by Singapore-based firms that were moved offshore involves transactions worth $390 million, according to court proceedings on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国通胀温和，股市上涨；贸易紧张局势提振收益率
item.description: 周四，科技股引领亚洲股市上扬，在不温不火的通胀数据缓解了市场对美国经济状况的担忧之后，科技股追随华尔街的涨势。【原文：Tech stocks led advances in Asia on Thursday, taking their cue from Wall Street's gains after tepid inflation data allayed concerns over the state of the U.S. economy.】

item.title: 英特尔新任首席执行官陈立武曾是成功的弱者
item.description: 陈立武可能是你从未听说过的最有权势的技术高管之一。当他走上这个星球上最受瞩目的职位之一--陷入困境、声名显赫的芯片制造商英特尔公司的首席执行官岗位时，他的表现将得到充分展示。【原文：Lip-Bu Tan may be one of the most powerful technology executives you've never heard of. As he steps into one of the highest-profile jobs on the planet, CEO of troubled, storied chipmaker Intel, his performance will be on full display.】

item.title: 担忧关税战升级对全球经济的影响，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于对关税战加剧对全球经济增长和能源需求影响的担忧超过了美国汽油库存超预期减少所带来的积极情绪，油价在前一天飙升后于周四有所回落。【原文：Oil prices eased on Thursday after surging the day before as worries about the impact of intensifying tariff wars on global economic growth and energy demand outweighed the positive sentiment from a larger-than-expected draw in U.S. gasoline stocks.】

item.title: 贸易战搅动市场，收益率上升带动美元反弹
item.description: 由于美国国债收益率上升，美元周四小幅反弹，但由于投资者难以确定不断升级的全球贸易战对美国通胀和经济增长的影响，各国货币在狭窄区间内交投。【原文：The dollar rebounded slightly on Thursday thanks to a rise in U.S. Treasury yields, though currencies traded in tight ranges as investors struggled to determine the impact of an escalating global trade war on U.S. inflation and growth.】

item.title: 应美国要求，印度逮捕被控洗钱的加密货币管理员
item.description: 印度打击犯罪最高机构周三表示，印度当局应华盛顿的要求逮捕了一名加密货币交易所管理员，他被指控共谋洗钱和违反制裁。【原文：Indian authorities arrested at Washington's request a cryptocurrency exchange administrator accused of money laundering conspiracy and violating sanctions, India's top crime fighting bureau said on Wednesday.】
